title: Secrets of interpreting a dream about rain by Al-Nabulsi, Al-Usaimi, and Ibn Sirin

preview.html: In the article below, we explain it to you. What is the interpretation of a dream about involuntary urination? Interpretation scholar Imam Nabulsi says that urine is the fluid that comes out of the human body and rids it of the toxins present in it. The meaning and the essential meaning, or are they just dreams from the subconscious mind that have no meaning? Therefore, the person with the vision resorts to the interpretation of scholars to explain his vision. Scientists say that this vision varies according to the social status of the person who is sleeping, and therefore we will explain to you through the following paragraphs of the encyclopedia what is the interpretation of seeing you wet the bed in... Dream follower: Interpretation of a dream about Al-Nabulsi’s involuntary urination. Imam Al-Nabulsi says: If a man sees in a dream that he is urinating on his bed, then this vision indicates the approaching date of his wedding. But if he dreams that he is urinating in a well, then this is a good vision that promises him to obtain lawful money to be spent from it. If the fortuneteller is working In trade and he sees that he is urinating on his goods, then this is a very welcome vision that indicates the loss of money. If the dreamer is suffering from poverty, and he sees in the dream that he is urinating a lot in his bed, then this is a good vision that portends the coming of comfort and the removal of worries. Imam Nabulsi says that seeing urine In the form of dirt or mud in a dream, it indicates that the dreamer does not wash well. If the sleeper sees in his dream that he is urinating, and the urine has a very unpleasant smell, this is a sign of problems in his life. But if the dreamer sees that he is drinking urine in his dream, this is an unpleasant vision. It indicates that the dreamer gets his money from prohibited sources. Interpretation of urine in a dream for a single woman: Dream interpretation scholars say that if an unmarried girl sees in a dream that she is urinating on her bed, this is a sign that the wedding of the girl she is dreaming about is approaching. But if she sees an unmarried girl Married woman in her dream that she is urinating in the toilet, this is a good vision that indicates that the dreamer is making the right decisions in her life and following good behaviors, and this vision also shows good. Reputation among people. If a girl sees in a dream that she is urinating in another place, this is a sign that the dreamer is suffering from some psychological problems and needs someone to help her. Dream interpretation scholars say that if an unmarried girl sees in her dream that the man she loves is urinating, this is a sign of That this man does many bad deeds and that the dreamer will divorce him. Imam Ibn Shaheen interprets seeing urine in an unmarried girl’s dream as a sign of the dreamer’s separation from the one he loves because of his bad mood. Interpretation of urinating in a dream for a married woman: If a married woman sees in her dream that she is urinating On her bed, this is a good vision that foretells that the Lord will carry her in the near future. But if the fortuneteller is already pregnant and she sees in her dream that she was urinating on her bed, then this is a sign that the time of childbirth is approaching, and she must prepare for that. And if the dreamer is suffering from many problems and disputes Between her and her husband, and she saw in her dream that she was urinating, this is a good vision that shows the end of all the problems and fears that she is suffering from. But if a woman sees...

title: Learn the interpretation of the dining room in a dream from Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Dining table in a dream: This vision is considered one of the favorite visions that carries many questions and interpretations. It is considered one of the dreams that indicate goodness, prosperity, and the achievement of many successes and profits. This dream varies depending on the condition of the table. Either it is broken, contains food, or is empty. The dining room in a dream by Ibn Sirinma. Interpretation of seeing a dining table in a dream? Dream interpretation of the dining room in the man’s dream and it was empty. The dream symbolizes that he is suffering from poverty, hunger, and bad luck and shows that there are many problems in his life. Marriage if he is married. If the person is free, then this vision shows that he has a separate and independent personality, and if he is close to God, then this is evidence of his generosity and compassion for the poor and needy. If the table is empty, this indicates that the dreamer will suffer from many problems that will expose him to poverty and temptation. If the table is not clean, this is evidence that the dreamer will be exposed to disobedience from his children and workers after he has lived a period of happiness and joy. If it is upside down, this is evidence that he has made many changes in his home, and if it is broken, this indicates that the dreamer will suffer failure. A major in his professional and social life. The dining room in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The interpretation of seeing the dining room by the scholar Ibn Sirin explains the goodness and blessings that God gives to the pioneer and shows the dreamer’s ability to get rid of his enemies and triumph over them. If it contains many varieties and types, this is evidence of an increase in goodness and livelihood. A life full of happiness and wealth. If he sees that the chairs at the table are not empty, this is a sign that the dreamer will be exposed to betrayal and some difficulties in his life from people close to him. The interpretation of seeing her at home is evidence of the stability of her family life and peace of mind. If the dreamer sees her outside the house, this is a sign of alienation. And the feeling of loneliness. All the dreams that worry you will find their interpretation here on the Egyptian website for interpreting dreams from Google. The dining room in a dream for a single woman. This vision shows that she will soon marry a good man who has many noble qualities such as chivalry and generosity, and it shows her success and excellence in the field of study or work in A job, and it leads her to many good qualities and high morals. And to be loved. If she sees herself buying it, this is evidence of the stability of her family life, helping the poor, and providing for their needs. Some interpreters believe that if it is dirty, then this dream indicates that she resents God’s blessing and does not keep it, and if it is empty, then this is evidence that Someone close to her had cheated on her. For her. The dining table in a dream for a married woman. The interpretation of a married woman seeing a table with many, many things in a dream is evidence that she is living a happy married life. If the food tastes sweet, and if the food is bad, then this is evidence of a dispute with her husband. If she sees her children gathered with her on that The table, this indicates the removal of her worries and problems and her feeling comfortable. Seeing this table in...

title: Interpretation of a dream about a bride in a dream for a single woman

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a bride in a dream for a single woman: It is a topic that can be thorny for some. The vision appears as good as it seems or has bad evidence, and we must be careful, because the meanings of dreams are sometimes completely opposite to what they contain, so in this article the encyclopedia website provides you with the full interpretation of this dream. Interpretation of a dream about a bride in a dream for a single woman Being a bride in a dream does not necessarily mean Close marriage, especially if you are single. On the contrary, being a bride in a dream often indicates: Your morals and innocence in life. If you are in joy and among your family and your husband by your side, but you feel very shy and perhaps more than usual, then this indicates that in reality you are a girl who has reconciled her religion and her worldly affairs. He has good feelings that many may envy you and you must preserve them forever. Whoever feels very happy and busy dancing and singing among friends and relatives, this indicates that she is an open personality, loves life and is excited about being at her best and always happy, which makes her a special and beloved personality. Among everyone. If an unmarried woman dreams that she enters her house to find that there is a wedding and she is the bride, but she does not realize it and is surprised and everyone blesses her, this means that she does not realize many things. In life, she may be naive and has very little life experience and may not be able to bear responsibility for it. Or not. Interpretation of a dream about a wedding party for a single woman without a song. Rejoicing usually consists of dancing, singing, and loud noises that mix happiness and harmony among family members as everyone celebrates a new beginning. Seeing the unmarried woman rejoicing herself when she is not truly connected, and the rejoicing was without singing or dancing, and indeed Her family was her ruler, and these are their usual customs, and this means that this girl will occupy one of the great positions, either achieving great success or reaching a great position in the work.. This is what he has been striving for for a long time. He who married without singing and became Sad and does not want this marriage to take place, this means that she is not satisfied with her life, but she is not rebelling against the current situation, which makes her feel suffocated and she does not want that. Complete it. Life is like that, but it does nothing. If an unmarried woman sees herself in Islamic joy without singing, as the book was written, and she is in one of the mosques, this means that there is good skin on her way to her, and that she will enter it. Life is what you wish for and you should expect good news soon. And whoever sees in her dream that she is getting married among strangers and the groom is also a stranger, and the wedding took place without a singer, this indicates that she will move from her life to another and that will be fairer than her life. You live now, perhaps you will travel to another country or move from one place of work to another. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a bride in a white dress for a single woman: It is not necessary that we see ourselves in dreams, we may see the dream, but for another person, perhaps he is close to us, or someone we know by chance , but this also carries a specific message for us.non-women

title: Interpretation of a dream about greeting and embracing a dead person

preview.html: We will carefully explain all of these interpretations or indications in our article today from gptafser.com/ where we will talk about the interpretation of a dream of greeting and embracing the dead, so follow this article with us if you are interested in this interpretation.Interpretation of seeing peace in the dead and embracing him in a dream for a single girlWhen an unmarried girl sees in Her dream is that she is reviving and reviving a dead person she knows in a dream. This dream indicates that her mind is occupied with the dead person, and that she is thinking about him deeply and is sad about his separation. This vision is because she misses him very much and this feeling is reflected in her dreams. Peace be upon the deceased in a dream for an unmarried girl, indicates happy news Coming to that unmarried girl. If an unmarried girl wakes up in her dreams peacefully and hugs one of her deceased parents in a dream. This dream indicates that the unmarried girl will get married soon. If she is engaged, and if she is not engaged, then this vision indicates that someone will propose to her. But if an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is greeting a dead person, but she feels fear and terror inside her and wants to escape from it. This vision shows that she is sad about a certain situation in her life and that she is forced to deal with this situation patiently and purposefully. The dream of greeting the deceased, peace be upon him, is interpreted by the girl’s right hand. The unmarried woman. Good news and ease for her after the sadness and period of grief that she has gone through. The appearance of the dead person in a dream for the unmarried girl indicates the event that will happen, so if the appearance of the dead person is good and good. It shows that there is good news. Moreover, there are things that will appear In a good way in the life of one girl. If her appearance is bad, this indicates that there is bad news for her, and that God Almighty is high. See also: Interpretation of dreams of the dead kissing the living. Interpretation of seeing peace in the dead and embracing him in a dream for a married woman. When a married woman sees that she is giving life to a dead person, and it is The dead person in a dream is happy, cheerful and looks good. This vision indicates that good news reaches her and that her life will change for the better with her husband. If a married woman sees that the deceased gives her a gift in a dream. This vision indicates that she or her husband will get a good job or a high position. The doors of livelihood will also open for her and she will get a lot of money and achieve many of the goals that she hoped to achieve. Greeting the dead in a dream for a married woman, which indicates difficulties in her life. But soon it will end and she will have financial stability. If a married woman sees that one of her parents is dead He received her in a dream. This vision indicates that one of her children will get married soon. Seeing a married woman in a dream greeting a dead person with her right hand. Evidence of the stability of her married life, and that she feels peace in her life. Watching a married woman greeting a dead person without her hands. This vision shows that she is a righteous woman. Close to God and afraid of disobeying God. A gift from a deceased person in a dream is good for the dreamer if a married woman sees in her dream that she revives a dead person and embraces him and is happy. This vision means that the dead person is satisfied with the condition of the one who saw it, and that he feels it.

title: I dreamed that I was carrying a cup in the kitchen and it fell and broke on top of me

preview.html: I dreamed that I was carrying a cup in the kitchen and it fell and broke on top of me. People see many dreams that they think are disturbing. Some of them see broken cups in the kitchen, as they feel fear as a result of that dreams, but not always the true interpretation of dreams in a dream shows something unpleasant. Sometimes we see A scary dream and we feel that it shows something not good. Indeed, this vision is good and shows some positive things and sometimes the opposite. What is the interpretation of my dream that I was carrying a cup in the kitchen and it broke me? What is the interpretation of a dream about seeing broken cups? What does a dream about seeing a kitchen indicate? To know the interpretation of a dream in which I dreamed that I was carrying a cup in the kitchen and it fell and broke, follow the article with us. I dreamed that I was carrying a cup in the kitchen and it fell and broke on top of me. The dream in which I dreamed that I was carrying a cup in the kitchen and it fell and broke on top of me is related to a series of dreams that can be interpreted for this dream, because The interpretation of the dream varies depending on the nature of the dreamer and according to the situation in which he saw the dream, as the state of the dreamer has a great influence on the process of interpreting the dream, and one of the most important interpretations related to the dream that I dreamed was that I was carrying the cup in the kitchen and it fell and broke as follows: Seeing broken cups in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about seeing broken cups in a dream. Seeing a broken cup in a dream. A man sees a broken cup in a dream. Seeing broken glass in a dream. As all of these dreams can be closely related to the interpretation of this dream, and below we will show you the most important interpretations related to this dream. Broken cups in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The dream of broken cups in a dream refers to certain interpretations that differ depending on the nature of the dreamer and the situation in which the dreamer saw the dream, such as: According to the interpretation of Imam Ibn Sirin, the dream of broken cups can refer to a woman, and sometimes it can indicate extreme poverty. It also indicates worries and sorrows that could affect the dreamer, and God forbid this and God Almighty. The Most High and Most Knowing. Seeing yourself eating a cup in a dream may indicate ill health, or it may indicate loss of money and poverty, and God knows best. Seeing a broken cup of water in a dream could indicate the approach of death and death, and God Almighty is Most High and Most Knowing. Seeing broken cups in A dream for a single or married woman: Seeing broken cups in a dream can indicate many different interpretations from one woman to another and depends on the nature of the person, as the interpretation can differ between a married woman and an unmarried woman, and the interpretation of this vision in a dream resulted in the following: A glass cup can indicate In a dream, it indicates a good and lawful life, and it can also indicate an improvement in the financial condition and mood, and when we see a cup broken in a dream for one girl, they can indicate evil, evil, sorrows, and defects, and God Almighty knows best. Sometimes a dream of seeing broken cups in a dream for a girl indicates Difficulty achieving desires and goals in life and inability to achieve dreams. Interpretation of a dream about mixed cups

title: Interpretation of a dream about duck eggs

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about duck eggs in a dream. We will present in the following lines what the interpretation of a dream about duck eggs in a dream means and whether it is good or not, according to the interpretations of scholars and not personal interpretations.Interpretation of a dream about duck eggs in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about duck eggs in a dream: Fulfillment of desires and God is higher and more enlightenedWhen you see A pregnant woman sees duck eggs, this may indicate that she will give birth to a boy, and God knows best. Likewise, if an unmarried girl sees duck eggs, then she can express freedom from problems and the payment of debts, God willing. If a married woman sees duck eggs in a dream, this may be evidence of paying off debts. Debts, and God is Greatest and Most Knowing. Interpretation of dreams about ducks attacking me in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about ducks attacking me in a dream could be a sign of anxiety, and God knows the unseen. But if the dreamer sees ducks attacking him in a dream, it may be an indication of worries and sorrows, and God knows the unseen. When an unmarried girl sees a duck attacking her, she may feel With anxiety because of blame, and God knows the unseen. If a married man sees a duck attacking him, this may be evidence of trouble, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about feeding ducks in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about feeding ducks in a dream could be a sign that things are becoming easier. God knows best. When a married woman sees feeding ducks in a dream In a dream, this could be evidence of kindness, and God knows the unseen. In the case of watching an unmarried girl eating ducks, this may be a sign of goodness and care, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Seeing feeding ducks can also express the good qualities of the dreamer, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of the dream of buying ducks in a dream. Interpretation Dreaming of buying ducks in a dream could be a sign of moving to a new home, and God knows the unseen. If an unmarried young man sees himself in a dream buying ducks, this may be a sign of marriage, and God knows best. Likewise, if an unmarried girl sees herself in a dream buying ducks, then she may This is a sign of kindness and marriage, and God knows best. When a married woman sees herself in a dream buying ducks, this may indicate good deeds, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream of colored ducks in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of colored ducks in a dream could be a sign of good luck, and God knows best. When a woman sees If a married woman sees colorful ducks in a dream, this may indicate good luck, and God knows the unseen. In the event that you see a married man buying colorful ducks in a dream, this may be evidence of the existence of many offspring, God willing. Also, seeing colored ducks indicates kindness and happiness, and God knows best. Interpretation of the dream of seeing ducks Hunting in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about seeing ducks hunting in a dream can indicate material gains and that God is higher and more knowledgeable. When an unmarried girl sees ducks hunting, this may indicate gains, and God knows the unseen. If a married woman is seen hunting a duck, this may be a sign of goodness and care, and God The greatest and most knowledgeable: seeing duck hunting also represents achieving goals, and God knows best. title: Interpretation of a dream about hitting a tambourine in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about hitting a tambourine in a dream In case you are looking for an interpretation of a dream about hitting a tambourine in a dream, it is one of the dreams that some people see, but there are a number of interpretations that the site explains, citing the interpretations of some scientific scholars who are trying to reach the truth. Interpretation of a dream about hitting a tambourine in a dream may indicate playing A tambourine in a dream indicates that the visionary is trying to get closer to the people around him during this time. Seeing the beating of a tambourine in a dream may indicate the return of an absent person who was away from home at that time. A dream about playing a tambourine may indicate a loss that the dreamer may suffer during this time. Time. Dreaming of hitting a bank in a dream may indicate the large number of enemies present around the insight at that time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream of hitting a bank in the face with shoes in a dream: In the event that a dream hits the face with shoes, this may indicate harm that may happen to the dreamer in his workplace during This period. Hitting the face with a shoe in a dream may indicate some problems that the dreamer faces during this period, and God knows best. It is possible that the dream of being hit in the face with a shoe indicates that the dreamer has turned away from God, Blessed and Most High, and needs to repent and return to God Almighty. If someone saw that he was hitting his face with a shoe, then there are some difficulties that the dreamer faces in his life in those days, and God knows best. Interpretation of dreams of the oppressor hitting the oppressed in a dream. The strike of the oppressed against the oppressor may indicate the abundant goodness that the dreamer will reap during this time. In the case of dreaming that The oppressor defeats the oppressed in a dream. This may indicate the distress that the dreamer will fall into during this period, and God knows best. Seeing the oppressor beating the oppressed in a dream may indicate problems that the dreamer may suffer from in his life during those days. Seeing the oppressor beating the oppressed in a dream may indicate problems that the dreamer may suffer from in his life during those days. The dream may mean that the dreamer will be exposed to a big problem during this time and he must ask God for help. Interpretation of a dream about a student hitting his teacher in a dream. Anyone who sees in a dream that the student was hitting the teacher may indicate corruption in life that the dreamer is carrying out and must stop. If he hits The teacher in a dream may indicate a crisis that the dreamer fell into during this time, and God knows best. It is possible to see the student hitting the teacher in a dream, which indicates some pressures that the dreamer faces during this time. Seeing the teacher knocking in a dream may indicate the need of the dreamer. For some advice to help you get through this stage, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream of giving a military salute in a dream: The military salute in a dream may indicate the psychological peace that the dreamer feels during those days. If one sees himself giving a military salute, this may indicate growth And the development that occurs in the life of the dreamer, thanks to God. Seeing a military salute in a dream may mean that the dreamer will enjoy a quiet life during this time. The interpretation of seeing a military salute in a dream is about some of the difficulties and problems that the dreamer faces in his work, which he will overcome with the grace of God.

title: Seeing fish in the refrigerator in a dream

preview.html: The dream here may differ somewhat, but for a married woman, it means pregnancy and indicates to other people about changes in the life of the dreamer, and we will show you from our website, and explain in detail everything related to the vision according to each individual. Issue.Interpretation of seeing fish in the refrigerator in a dream for one girl. Seeing fish in the refrigerator in an unmarried girl’s dream indicates that she is a lucky girl and has many opportunities. Whereas if she sees in a dream that she is catching fish from the refrigerator, then the unmarried woman has that. The vision may mean That there are some bad things happening in her life and that God is all-knowing. While she sees raw fish after leaving the refrigerator. It is a sign of haste in making a decision, and not waiting, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. And seeing fish coming out of the freezer in one girl’s dream. It is a sign that you are hearing Bad news, and God knows best. It is said in the interpretation of seeing fish that fresh fish came out in a single girl’s dream. It is a sign of the successes that follow the life of the visionary. And if a single girl sees that she is catching a fish from cloudy water in a dream, its meaning may include some difficulties that She faces it in her life, and God is Most High. The appearance of tilapia fish in an unmarried girl’s dream indicates happy occasions that the dreamer will see, God willing. See also: Interpretation of seeing fish in a dream for a single woman. Interpretation of seeing fish in the refrigerator in a dream for a married woman. Seeing a married woman taking fish out of the refrigerator. It means improving the conditions around her. While seeing fish in the freezer in a married woman’s dream indicates some obstacles that the dreamer is going through. Seeing fish being caught while it is in the refrigerator is a sign of great troubles and worries, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. What if a married woman sees tilapia fish in the refrigerator? This vision carries a lot of good news in it, thanks to God Almighty. When a married woman sees a colorful fish in the refrigerator, she will enjoy goodness and happiness in her life. While seeing a small fish in the refrigerator for a married woman in a dream is evidence of some marital problems that will soon disappear with permission. God. It is said that seeing a big fish inside the refrigerator is a promising dream for its owner. That is, the big fish, while it is in the refrigerator in a married woman’s dream, indicates a change in circumstances for the better, with the help of God Almighty. Interpretation of seeing fish in the refrigerator in a dream about a man and its meaningGiven the lack of an interpretation According to Ibn Sirin, to see fish in the refrigerator in a dream, we have cited some modern interpreters to explain this vision: Seeing fish in the refrigerator in a married man’s dream indicates taking advantage of some opportunities during his work. Whereas if he sees that he is catching fish and cooking it in a dream of marriage, he will gain a lot of happiness. Sustenance is by the grace of God Almighty. If a married man sees that a fish is in the refrigerator in a dream. It is a sign of some problems and difficulties, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing a big fish in a married man’s dream. It is a sign of opening many doors for work and an abundance of money with the help of God Almighty. And when a man sees Married people are small fish

title: Interpretation of seeing falafel in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about buying falafel: I saw in a dream that I was buying falafel, so the dream shows that many of the difficulties that the dreamer faced in his life have been overcome. Go and buy falafel and falafel. In the dream, it is an indication of the fulfillment of the desires that the dreamer seeks. I dreamed that I was cooking falafel, this indicates However, I will get a lot of nutrition and goodness, thanks to God. Eating falafel and falafel in a dream is evidence that you enjoy stability and a sense of security in family life, and God knows best. Eating falafel in a dream for the dreamer symbolizes the acquisition of a large and famous project, but he must beware of the hypocrites around him. Interpretation of the falafel symbol in a dream for a single woman: See I am eating falafel in a single girl’s dream. It symbolizes obtaining a lot of money and you will be very happy with it. Eating falafel in a dream means that you will get a new job or job, as you will get rid of sadness, worry, and anxiety during this time. Seeing it Eating falafel in a dream for an unmarried girl indicates her relationship with a virtuous and religious man. It also indicates that the dream for a single girl is to be high among men, whether in excellence in work or knowledge, and God knows best. But if a girl sees that she is buying falafel in a dream, this symbolizes diligence, struggle, and struggle until she reaches To the long-awaited dream. This indicates that she is a girl with many aspects, ways, and many good characteristics. But if the girl sees that she is buying falafel in a dream, this indicates that she is in a bad psychological state, and the difficult period she is going through in her life, as well as her exposure to crises and conflicts. The dream also shows the girl’s inability to bear hardship and the extent of her need for someone to depend on to deal with what she is going through. Seeing a free girl buying falafel in a dream indicates problems in her life and she is trying to fix them in different ways and wants to escape from these experiences and difficulties. Seeing a girl preparing falafel in a dream indicates Facilitating many aspects of her life and also shows her success and excellence at work. Seeing Tamaya preparation in a dream indicates a delay in achieving long-awaited desires or dreams, and God knows best. The Al-Taamiya frying pan in the dream of an unmarried girl indicates the good news of hearing good news and communication in the near future. Interpretation of the vision of eating falafel in a dream for a married woman. It is one of the dreams that does not worry a married woman, as it indicates goodness for her and her family. The dream of falafel in a married woman’s dream symbolizes the strong bond, love, and familiarity between her and her partner. Acquiring goodness and the doors of livelihood that open to a married woman, and the abundant goodness that she is satisfied with. Seeing falafel in a dream for a married woman means finding a new job or job. Likewise, when a married woman dreams that she is preparing food for her children and husband, she shows her concern for them, her care for them, and her attempt to console them. Falafel or falafel in a dream symbolizes a feeling of stability and happiness in her family life. Interpretation Seeing frying falafel in a dream for a single woman. Eating falafel and falafel in an unmarried girl’s dream symbolizes
